name: The Shift V1.5
description:
A short pixelated narrative-based adventure exploration game where you control a person through 6 different worlds, collecting items and talking to characters along the way. There is not much complexity to the game play, considering that this is my first game besides a text adventure that I made. Only collecting items and talking to characters. 

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Enter Key - Continue Text

Made with the Bitsy Game Maker:

https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

Big New Update! V1.5 is now available, with the addition of the City, which includes:

-8 new characters

-8 new items to collect

-More humor

-A secret room
